KitKat::

She looked at Shadowcaster.  "Oh no. Another bot saying this allience 
stuff is true."  She turned and faced them. "Now let's get a small 
grip on reality shall we bots? There is no allience, there is no plot 
for maximals and predacons to be friends. I have been through too 
many battles and lost my base, my friends, my warriors and nearly my 
life. I have faught too long to quit now. You maximals have been my 
enemies for too long. And no way in the pit will you convince me 
other wise."  She put her hand on her stomach and felt the empty 
space in her internal compartment. "However, I am not entirely un 
aware of the conduct and care for of prisoners. Even when I had 
maximals in my cells, they were treated very well. high class food, 
thier own quarters complete entertainment center complete with 
holodeck and left to be unharmed. Just they would be under heavy 
guard and not allowed to wander the ship. However, being at war, I 
would still use the CR chambers to extract information. Or try to. 
Your command codes are impressively hard to crack. I will give you 
that one, maximal."

She looked around and wondered when they would begin torturing her. 
She knew it would eventually happen, just a matter of time. "NOw 
then, please feed me and show me to my cell. Even if it truely is in 
the brigg."  SHe was trying to devise a way out. So far as she could 
tell, she could find the way out if she only made it to the hallway. 
However, there were now several bots blocking her way. She would have 
to bide her time and wait for her chance. 

"Now then, back to feeding the prisoner, if you don't mind."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster heard the alarms and raced into the CR
> chamber- why was it that in a time of Peace, the
> Maximals still had their auto-defense system up and
> running? He just knew there was going to be trouble.
> 
> Squeezing into the corridors, he quickly made his way
> into the CR Chamber. Cooley but authoratively he
> commanded "Calm down- ALL of you. This IS a time when
> all factions are united as was just said, however as a
> united race Rodimus doesn't come into this Kup. Now
> why don't you all show some respect for Primus and
> STAND DOWN!"
> 
> The look in his eye showed he was not taking this
> situation lightly. 
> 
>  --- Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote: >
> Cooley:
> > Droping out of The cloaked watch he has been doing
> > on the CR. "Hold up all of you, I have been watching
> > her and the reason why the alarms went off is
> > becouse no one was watching the timer. Now where
> > they. She was badly injured and was brought here by
> > Malice and Wolfboy. Now Back off you two." Cooley
> > looks at Winlord and Kup. then to KitKat, "As for
> > you I got a close eye on you. Little miss. Besides
> > you still owe me one." He smiles.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord/Kup::
> > 
> > Windlord arrived to CR's rooms and he looked KitKat
> > and 
> > shouted"FREEZE!!!! how you dare come in our base,
> > PRED!!!"
> > 
> > "Hold on, Windlord"said Kup "We should interogate
> > her first... 
> > WE... "
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> > <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > KitKat::
> > > 
> > > She took a few steps  back and growled at the
> > door.  She could 
> > smell 
> > > maximals and didn't want a confrontation. But knew
> > it was 
> > unavoidable.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000"
> > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: While robo is back I'll post with Kup and
> > DeathStar
> > > >

> > > >

> > > > huged her and looked around.
> > > > 
> > > > Death Starlooked awared looking for the intruder
> > guessing that 
> > > > unicron had sent his minions again.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup and Windlord ran towards CR's trying to find
> > out what's goin 
> > on
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com,
> > "shadowess_azogoth"

> > > > > KitKat::
> > > > > 
> > > > > She finally stretched and awoke fully in the
> > CR chamber.  She 
> > > > watched 
> > > > > as the links and connections disengaged and
> > the chamer opened 
> > up 
> > > > for 
> > > > > her.  She stepped out and looked around. Her
> > nose told her she 
> > > > wasn't 
> > > > > in a pred base.  She transformed into wolf
> > mode and started 
> > BASE 
> > > > > INTRUDER ALERT STARTED SOUNDING OFF.  She
> > closed her optics 
> > and 
> > > > > winces, "Damn, this just isn't my eon is it?"
> > she muttered and 
> > > > > prepared for battle.
